entities.name: Systran SAS
entities.growthStrategySummary: An ambitious growth strategy based on accelerated deployment of cloud solutions and diversification into new segment (e.g., media), new geographies and new customers (SMEs, B2C). A clear strategic roadmap with 5 main growth pillars: New technological innovations (foster R&D of transcript and context awareness translation), Core business growth (increasing MT solutions demands from emerging industries), External growth (attractive targets identified and on-going discussions), Cloud solution development (Marketplace and quality-control solutions), and International expansion (several key regions identified).

dealRationaleHighlights: Ambitious growth strategy based on accelerated deployment of cloud solutions and diversification into new segments, geographies, and customers.
Clear strategic roadmap with 5 main growth pillars.
Attractive targets identified and on-going discussions with an active lead for external growth.
